directions.step:
Rinse, stem and pat dry tomatoes. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add basil. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and cook, tossing them, for 5 minutes or heated through. Serve immediately. 10 servings.
NOTE: Be careful not to overcook as tomatoes will become mushy.
JUNION LEAGUE OF LITTLE ROCK'S
"TRADITIONS: A TASTE OF THE GOOD
LIFE", FROM BEN HUSSMAN
From a collection of my mother's (Judy Hosey) recipe box which contained lots of her favorite recipes, clippings, etc. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
